name: Castle Royal Abbey
description:
DESCRIPTION
Ideally located between the cities of Castres and Toulouse and Carcassonne, this Château invites you in its green setting to make you live the best day of your life in a dream setting. Step through the doors of this great building and let your craziest dreams come to life.
At the heart of its 11 hectares of greenery, the Chateau will give life to the most beautiful celebration of your life. If you choose to organise this great day outside, a beautiful marquee of 300m2 can accommodate your wedding reception of 450 people in buffet and up to 300 seats.
Indoors, a sumptuous summer lounge of 100m2 overlooking the park and French embroidery invites you into the Chateau so that you can share this great moment of celebration with your loved ones. The 16th century cloister and its unusual appearance that will surprise you and be an ideal location for a cocktail in a more intimate atmosphere.
The Château has benefited from a recent interior restoration to offer its guests to spend one or more nights in its walls. In addition to our rooms at the Castle, we put at your disposal our charming cottage, and a large list of accommodation in the immediate vicinity, allowing your guests to sleep on site or very close by. We can offer accommodation on site for an additional cost (a cottage for 6 people in the park and a suite for the newlyweds in the castle), and nearby (a few minutes from the castle) cottages and bed and breakfast.
We have established privileged partnerships with caterers in our region, but we give you the freedom to choose the one that suits you best. You can also choose your wines, champagne and spirits at no additional cost, because we do not ask for a corkage fee (this is part of our agreement with the caterers that we can present).
The Château offers a wide range of furniture necessary for your wedding reception, including tables, chairs and decorative elements. We can also offer you our selection of professional partners of reception space decoration.
The Château opens its doors from Friday to Sunday so that you can organise your day according to your requirements. The owners of the estate will make every effort to make you feel at home and you just have to enjoy the arrival of your big day. In order to make your preparation as pleasant as possible, we offer you a selection of quality service providers, who will meet your expectations. With more than twenty years of international experience in services, we understand and share your needs for places and services of impeccable quality to host your professional events.
Nearest Airport: Castres (22mins; 18km) Toulouse (58mins; 78km) Carcassonne (1h02; 74km)
additional_info:
FEATURES
Baby friendly (cots, changing facilities)
Hotel recommendation list
